title: Entitlements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not logged in as an entitled MLB.tv user
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user attempts to launch the ROKU game of the week
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be unable to receive video playback due to not having the proper credentials

title: Video Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is signed into an entitled MLB.tv account

AND

1. The user elects to view the live game being broadcasted on ROKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Attempting to launch the stream from the following areas:

- Watch Now Hero
- Watch Now Games Carousel
- Games Segment
- Scores page scoreboard Button
- Team page scoreboard Button
- Home page scoreboard Button
- Gameday's Game EPG Button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The video player should begin playback within the MLB app

AND

1. The user will not be deeplinked into another app

AND

1. The user will not receive an error message

title: Pre-game Show
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The ROKU game is scheduled

AND

1. The user wants to watch the pre-game show while logged into an entitled MLB.tv account
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. There is a live pre-game show available to watch before game playback begins
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The pre-game show will begin either 15-minutes before or after the top of the hour
AND

1. An example would be an 11:15 AM pre-game shows for an 11:45 first pitch

AND

1. Another example would be an 11:45 AM pre-game show for a 12:15 first-pitch
